review.title: “I-Logicon is a good company for beginners and there is no work pressure to employees. culture and some systems are good.”
review.pros: Pros – Good support and environment..lot of freedom we can get for work and there is no much restriction.they give sufficient time for work and learning new things.
review.cons: Cons – salary wise average.. they have to learn how to keep employee in the company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – According to company standards they have to give increment at right time..
